8.description: Prevents crows from attacking your crops. Has a limited radius (about 8 "tiles").
8.name: Scarecrow

9.description: Collects energy from lightning storms and turns it into battery packs.
9.name: Lightning Rod

10.description: Place outside and wait for delicious honey! (Except in Winter).
10.name: Bee House

12.description: Place a fruit or vegetable in here. Eventually it will turn into a beverage.
12.name: Keg

13.description: Turns ore and coal into metal bars.
13.name: Furnace

15.description: Turns vegetables into pickles and fruit into jam.
15.name: Preserves Jar

17.description: Turns raw wool into fine cloth.
17.name: Loom

21.description: Insert a gem of your choice and it will grow copies.
21.name: Crystalarium

25.description: Place crops inside to produce a varying amount of seeds. Doesn't work with fruit tree crops.
25.name: Seed Maker

37.description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.
37.name: Wood Sign

38.description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.
38.name: Stone Sign

39.description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.
39.name: Dark Sign

62.description: Grows crops from any season when indoors. Outdoors, it can only house seasonal crops.
62.name: Garden Pot

71.description: Use this to move down a level in the mines.
71.name: Staircase

83.description: There's something unsettling about the looks of this statue.
83.name: Wicked Statue

105.description: Place on a maple, oak, or pine tree and wait for the reservoir to fill with product!
105.name: Tapper

108.description: Flowers planted in an oak barrel. Blooms in spring and summer.
108.name: Tub o' Flowers

114.description: Turns 10 pieces of wood into one piece of coal.
114.name: Charcoal Kiln

130.description: A place to store your items.
130.name: Chest

143.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
143.name: Wooden Brazier

144.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
144.name: Stone Brazier

145.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
145.name: Gold Brazier

146.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
146.name: Campfire

147.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
147.name: Stump Brazier

148.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
148.name: Carved Brazier

149.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
149.name: Skull Brazier

150.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
150.name: Barrel Brazier

151.description: Provides a moderate amount of light.
151.name: Marble Brazier

152.description: Provides a good amount of light.
152.name: Wood Lamp-post

153.description: Provides a good amount of light.
153.name: Iron Lamp-post

154.description: Produces bait on a regular basis. The worms are self-sufficient.
154.name: Worm Bin

156.description: Hatches slimes eggs into slimes. Allows you to raise slimes outdoors.
156.name: Slime Incubator

158.description: Compresses 100 pieces of slime into a slime egg. It's a miracle of science!
158.name: Slime Egg-Press

163.description: Use in the cellar to age products like wine and cheese.
163.name: Cask

167.description: Prevents crows from attacking your crops. Has a large radius (about 16 "tiles").
167.name: Deluxe Scarecrow

209.description: Allows you to play your favorite tunes.
209.name: Mini-Jukebox

231.description: Slowly generates batteries when left in the sun.
231.name: Solar Panel

232.description: A place to store your items.
232.name: Stone Chest

238.description: Place two on the farm to warp between them.
238.name: Mini-Obelisk

239.description: Scans the farm and displays useful information.
239.name: Farm Computer

254.description: Hatches ostrich eggs into baby ostriches. Place in a barn.
254.name: Ostrich Incubator

264.description: Place on a maple, oak, or pine tree and wait for the reservoir to fill with product! Works twice as fast as a normal tapper.
264.name: Heavy Tapper

275.description: Items placed inside will automatically be loaded into the machine in front of it.
275.name: Hopper

Anvil.description: Allows you to re-forge trinkets, randomizing their stats. Costs 3 iridium bars per use.
Anvil.name: Anvil

BaitMaker.description: Place a fish inside to create targeted bait.
BaitMaker.name: Bait Maker

BigChest.description: It can store almost twice as much as a regular chest.
BigChest.name: Big Chest

BigStoneChest.description: It can store almost twice as much as a regular chest.
BigStoneChest.name: Big Stone Chest

Dehydrator.description: Place 5 pieces of fruit or edible mushrooms inside to dry them.
Dehydrator.name: Dehydrator

DeluxeWormBin.description: Produces Deluxe Bait on a regular basis. The worms are self-sufficient.
DeluxeWormBin.name: Deluxe Worm Bin

FishSmoker.description: Place fish inside with a piece of coal to create smoked fish, which is worth double. The quality of the fish is preserved.
FishSmoker.name: Fish Smoker

HeavyFurnace.description: It's more efficient than a regular furnace. Requires 25 pieces of ore and 3 coal per use.
HeavyFurnace.name: Heavy Furnace

MiniForge.description: Now, you can use a dwarvish forge from the convenience of your home.
MiniForge.name: Mini-Forge

MushroomLog.description: Grows mushrooms every so often. The more wild trees are nearby, the better it works.
MushroomLog.name: Mushroom Log

StatueOfBlessings.description: Touching the statue gives a unique blessing every day.
StatueOfBlessings.name: Statue Of Blessings

StatueOfTheDwarfKing.description: Choose from two mining-related powers each day.
StatueOfTheDwarfKing.name: Statue Of The Dwarf King

TextSign.description: You can write a custom message on this sign.
TextSign.name: Text Sign
